LanguageData.SQP_No_skill_de_levelling_Description: Skill levels can't decrease from skill degradation
LanguageData.SQP_Daily_xp_cap_level_based_Description: Learning Saturation is no longer fixed at 4k per day and level*500 + 1000 instead
LanguageData.SQP_Passion_tweak_enabled_Description: Passion now modifies xp gain by 1, 1.25 and 1.5, instead of 0.33, 1 and 1.5
LanguageData.SQP_Passion_gain_enabled_Description: Levelling up gives a Pawn the chance to gain Passion for a skill
LanguageData.SQP_Passion_cap_enabled_Description: A Pawn can have a maximum of 4 passionate skills, gaining passion in a skill will downgrade the passion on a random other skill
LanguageData.SQP_Plant_resting_enabled_Description: If disabled, plants can grow 24 hours a day
